HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: € 6,90 for orders from € 0,00. Free for orders from € 49,90.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Austrian Post: within 3 working days. Slovenian Post: within 4 working days. DHL Express: within 2 working days.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Within 2 working days. For European metropolises, delivery is on the next working day.
express_delivery.pricing: DHL Express pricing depends on weight: up to 2 kg: €16.50, up to 5 kg: €20.50, up to 10 kg: €39.00, up to 20 kg: €65.00, up to 30 kg: €94.50, up to 70 kg: €182.50. If the order exceeds 70 kg, the costs of the additional weight are added.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Additional costs will be charged for selected items due to their nature and the associated special handling. These costs are calculated independently of the shipping costs. For special shipping with handling costs, the fees depend on the weight: up to 30 kg: normal handling fee; 30.01 to 60 kg: double handling fee; 60.01 to 90 kg: triple handling fee, and so on.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: The freight forwarder will contact you by phone to arrange a delivery date.

3djake.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery, bulky product delivery, parcel shop pickup, and parcel locker delivery are available. In-store pickup is not offered.
PROVIDERS: Standard delivery is handled by Austrian Post and Slovenian Post. Express delivery is via DHL Express. Bulky items are delivered by a freight forwarder. DPD and Fedex Economy are also listed as partners.
PRICING: Standard home delivery costs €6.90 and is free for orders over €49.90. Express delivery starts at €16.50 and increases with weight. Bulky items incur additional handling fees based on weight.
RESTRICTIONS: Deliveries are dispatched from Austria, so no shipments occur on Austrian public holidays. There is no specific information available regarding surcharges for delivery to Croatian islands or for cash on delivery (COD) payments.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The free shipping threshold is relatively low at €49.90. A fast express delivery option is available. Delivery for bulky items is scheduled via a personal phone call from the freight forwarder.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive and clearly presented on a dedicated page. It details providers, delivery times, and costs for standard and express options. However, it lacks information on potential island surcharges and COD fees, which are relevant for the Croatian market.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Shipping costs are calculated in the shopping cart. For European customers, a method with pre-paid tax and VAT is available: "Global special products Airline-Line6 (Remote Areas Excluded) Custom Tax & VAT Included". Otherwise, customers are responsible for import tax and duty.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Estimated delivery time = Product Shipping Time + Estimated shipping time of chosen Shipping Method. Product shipping time varies (24 hours, 3-14 business days, or longer for pre-orders).

weekend_delivery.days: Public holidays and weekends are excluded when calculating estimated delivery time.

3fvape.com.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery is the only method mentioned, available via various international carriers. No options for parcel shops, lockers, or in-store pickup were found.
PROVIDERS: Shipping is handled by generic services like 'Air Mail', 'ePacket', 'Railway Shipping', and 'Express Shipping'. A specific line for Europe, 'Global special products Airline-Line6', is also offered.
PRICING & DELIVERY TIME: Specific costs and delivery times for Croatia are not provided; they are calculated at checkout. Total delivery time depends on product processing time (which can be up to 14+ days) plus transit time. A shipping option with pre-paid tax and VAT is available for Europe; otherwise, the customer is responsible for customs duties.
RESTRICTIONS: Deliveries are not made on weekends or public holidays. Cash on delivery is not supported. No information is available regarding delivery to Croatian islands or for bulky items.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The store may combine or split orders without prior notification. The final delivery time is heavily influenced by the product's individual sourcing/processing time.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is very general and lacks country-specific details for Croatia. Critical information such as final costs, specific couriers, and precise delivery timeframes is only available during the checkout process, making it difficult for users to assess shipping options beforehand.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:

DHL Express: 20 €.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: 4.99 € for orders under 60 €. Free for orders 60 € and over.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: 2.99 € for orders under 60 €. Free for orders 60 € and over.

4endurance.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery, parcel locker delivery, and pickup at post offices. 
PROVIDERS: Delivery partners are Hrvatska pošta, Box Now, and DHL Express. 
PRICING: Standard delivery via Hrvatska pošta costs 4.99€, and Box Now parcel locker delivery costs 2.99€. Shipping is free for all orders of 60€ or more. Express delivery via DHL is a flat rate of 20€. 
RESTRICTIONS: Cash on delivery (COD) is available for Hrvatska pošta deliveries but is explicitly not possible for Box Now parcel locker deliveries. Information on island surcharges and weekend delivery is not available. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: Clear free shipping threshold at 60€. Multiple delivery methods including standard, express, and parcel locker. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a dedicated 'Besplatna dostava' page and is generally clear and concise. It covers the main delivery options, providers, and costs effectively. However, it lacks details regarding potential island surcharges, specific COD fees, and weekend delivery options.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Za narudžbe u vrijednosti od 17,90 € i iznad dostava je besplatna. Ako je vrijednost narudžbe manja, naknada za dostavu i usluge po narudžbi iznosi 2,90 € uključujući PDV.

aboutyou.hr.SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Standard home delivery is the only method offered. Delivery is restricted to the Republic of Croatia. PROVIDERS: Hrvatska Pošta (Post HR) is the only indicated delivery partner. PRICING: Delivery is free for orders of €17.90 and above. For orders below this value, a fee of €2.90 applies. NOTABLE FEATURES: Payment on delivery (pouzećem) is available, though no specific surcharge is mentioned. The store offers a 100-day return policy. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is minimal and located within the General Terms and Conditions (Opći uvjeti poslovanja), not on a dedicated page. While the pricing structure is clear, the site lacks essential details such as estimated delivery times, information on island deliveries, express options, or alternative delivery methods like parcel shops or lockers. The overall quality of shipping information is poor due to its lack of detail and difficult-to-find location.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cijena dostave za narudžbe do 265 € i ispod 25 kg težine je 6 €, dok je dostava besplatna za narudžbe iznad 265 €.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Pošiljke teže od 25 kg šalju se na trošak kupca ili se naplaćuje tržišna vrijednost dostave.

adm.hr.SUMMARY:

WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is basic and found on a combined 'Delivery and Complaints' page. It clearly states the providers and pricing structure for standard parcels. However, it lacks crucial details such as delivery timeframes, express options, weekend delivery, island surcharges, and COD fees.

adrialece.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery, parcel locker pickup, and in-store pickup.
PROVIDERS: Delivery partners include Hrvatska pošta, Overseas Express, and Box Now.
PRICING: Home delivery starts at 3.49€, parcel locker delivery at 2.99€, and in-store pickup costs 0.99€. Free shipping is available for all orders over 55€. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 0.90€ applies to all applicable orders.
RESTRICTIONS: Orders are not shipped on weekends or holidays. There is no information regarding extra charges or restrictions for delivery to Croatian islands.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Customers can pick up their orders at physical store locations in Zagreb and Split, which are open on Saturdays. The website mentions 'priority processing' but does not define it as a formal express delivery option with distinct pricing or timelines.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is well-organized and clearly presented on a dedicated 'Dostava' page. The table format makes it easy to compare costs and payment methods for different delivery options. The inclusion of store addresses and opening hours is a significant plus. The only notable omission is information about island deliveries.

amds.hr.SUMMARY:

While the core details are present, they could be more accessible on a dedicated delivery page. The pricing information for BOX NOW refers to future dates in 2025, which may be confusing for customers placing orders currently. Details on island delivery are limited to potential delays and a non-delivery list for DPD, lacking specific surcharge information.

biobio.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery and in-store pickup (Click & Collect) are available. Parcel shop and locker delivery are not offered.
PROVIDERS: DPD is the primary courier for Croatia. Hrvatska pošta (HP) is used for islands not covered by DPD.
PRICING: Standard home delivery costs 4€ for orders up to 50€ and is free for orders over 50€. Cash on delivery is an option, but no surcharge is mentioned. In-store pickup pricing is not specified.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery is limited to Croatia and Slovenia. There is no delivery on weekends (Saturday, Sunday) or holidays. Island deliveries follow a specific schedule and may involve a different courier (HP).
NOTABLE FEATURES: A same-day 'Brza zagrebačka dostava' (Fast Zagreb Delivery) is available for orders placed by 12 PM, with zoned pricing. Click & Collect is available at all 25 store locations across Croatia.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated 'Plaćanje i dostava' page. Details on standard delivery, express options for Zagreb, pricing tiers, and providers are easy to find. The Click & Collect service is also well-explained with a full list of pickup locations. While the site mentions different delivery arrangements for islands, specific surcharge information is not provided, directing users to check DPD's schedule or contact customer service. Overall, the information is comprehensive and user-friendly.

WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is generally clear and easy to find. The free shipping threshold is prominently displayed. While the need to contact for a quote on bulky items is a slight inconvenience, the overall transparency of shipping terms is good.

decathlon.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Decathlon.hr offers several delivery methods: Home Delivery (Standard, Fast, and Express via Wolt Drive), Bulky Item Delivery, Parcel Shop Pickup, and free In-Store Pickup.
PROVIDERS: Main couriers are GLS, DPD, and UPS. Bulky items are handled by Intereuropa. Express local delivery is provided by Wolt Drive.
PRICING: Standard home delivery is €4.49, while fast delivery is €4.99. Parcel shop delivery costs €2.99 (standard) or €3.49 (fast). In-store pickup is always free. Bulky items have specific pricing, with bicycles costing around €7.99-€9.99 and heavier items €20.00-€22.00.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery to certain Croatian islands and remote areas is limited or may incur delays. Cash on Delivery (COD) is available up to €1660 for deliveries and €10000 for in-store pickup, but is not an option for Wolt Drive deliveries. Parcel shop deliveries have size and weight limits (e.g., max 20kg for DPD, 5kg for GLS).
NOTABLE FEATURES: A key feature is the Wolt Drive service, offering delivery within 2 hours in a 10km radius of a store. In-store pickup is also very fast, with items often ready in 1 hour if in stock locally. There is a price difference for shipping bicycles from the warehouse versus from a store, as store-shipped bikes are pre-assembled.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly and comprehensively on a dedicated 'Uvjeti dostave' page. The use of icons, tables, and a detailed FAQ section makes it easy for customers to find and understand delivery options, costs, and limitations. The information is well-organized and complete.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Pricing is based on weight. For mainland (Zona 1 i 2): 45 kg - 20,70€, 100 kg - 59,80€, 500 kg - 117,30€, up to 3,000 kg for 694,60€. For orders over 100 kg, the delivery price is calculated and communicated to the customer subsequently.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Yes, there is a separate, higher price list for islands. For example, a 100 kg package costs 82,80€ to an island vs 59,80€ to the mainland. There is also a specific delivery schedule for different islands.

drijen.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery for standard and very heavy/bulky items (up to 3,000 kg) across Croatia, as well as in-store pickup from their garden center in Lučko. Parcel shop or locker delivery is not available.
PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by In Time and GLS.
PRICING: Delivery is paid by the customer, with a minimum order value of €30. Mainland delivery starts at €11.50 for packages up to 40 kg. There is no free shipping threshold. Prices increase significantly with weight.
RESTRICTIONS: Deliveries are dispatched only from Monday to Thursday. Deliveries to islands are subject to a surcharge and follow a specific weekly schedule, with some islands receiving deliveries only on certain days (including Saturdays).
NOTABLE FEATURES: The primary payment method for online orders is cash on delivery (pouzeće). The shop specializes in delivering very heavy items, with a detailed price list up to 3,000 kg. In-store pickup is available, including on Saturdays.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a dedicated 'Narudžbe i Dostava' page and is quite detailed, especially the weight-based pricing table. However, information about in-store pickup is only mentioned in a top banner and not integrated into the main delivery page, which could be missed by users.

ealati.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery for standard parcels (up to 50 kg) and bulky/pallet items (over 50 kg), as well as delivery to parcel lockers and parcel shops. Delivery is limited to Croatia.
PROVIDERS: Delivery partners are GLS, Overseas Express, and Gebrüder Weiss for bulky items.
PRICING: Standard home delivery costs 5 € (Overseas) or 7 € (GLS). GLS Parcel Locker delivery is 3.50 €. Bulky item delivery is 40 € for the mainland and 60 € for islands. No free shipping threshold is mentioned.
RESTRICTIONS: Weekend delivery is not available for standard parcels. For bulky items, Saturday delivery is possible for some islands. Pallet delivery is restricted to a specific list of islands.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website clearly distinguishes between parcel and pallet delivery based on weight, with separate pricing tables. Customers can redirect Overseas Express shipments to over 850 partner parcel shops. Links to courier schedules for island deliveries are provided.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is well-organized, detailed, and easy to understand. The use of tables for pricing is effective. However, information regarding express delivery options and cash-on-delivery surcharges is missing.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: € 6,90 for orders under € 49,90. Free for orders from € 49,90.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Additional costs will be charged for selected items due to their nature and the associated special handling. This information is displayed on the product detail page.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: The delivery company will contact you by phone to arrange a delivery date.

ecco-verde.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Ecco-verde.hr provides standard and express home delivery to Croatia from Austria, as well as delivery for bulky goods and an option for pickup at post office points.
PROVIDERS: Standard delivery is handled by Austrian Post and Slovenian Post. Express delivery is via DHL Express. Other listed partners include Fedex Economy and DPD. Bulky items are delivered by an unspecified freight forwarder.
PRICING: Standard delivery costs €6.90 and is free for orders of €49.90 and above. Express delivery pricing is tiered by weight, starting at €16.50 for up to 2 kg. Bulky item shipping costs are shown on the product page.
RESTRICTIONS: No specific information is available regarding surcharges for island delivery or cash on delivery.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website offers a clear free shipping threshold. Detailed weight-based pricing for express delivery is provided. Special handling options for bulky and refrigerated items are available. Customers can opt to have their parcels delivered to an Austrian Post pickup station.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive and well-structured within a dedicated page. It clearly outlines costs, providers, and delivery times for different services. However, it lacks information on COD surcharges and potential extra costs for island deliveries. The distinction between parcel lockers and pickup points could be more precise.

ecco.com.SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The provided webpage is for ECCO USA and explicitly states, 'At this time, we only ship merchandise within the continental US, Alaska and Hawaii.' Therefore, no shipping options (Home Delivery, Parcel Shops, In-Store Pickup, etc.) are available for Croatia. PRICING & PROVIDERS: All pricing and provider information pertains to the US market only. Free standard shipping is offered on orders over $150 within the US. No information on Croatian delivery providers or pricing is available. RESTRICTIONS: Shipping is strictly limited to the USA. NOTABLE FEATURES: The US site offers a 'Buy Online, Pick Up In Store' option, but this is not applicable to Croatia. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clear and unambiguous for US customers but confirms that international shipping to countries like Croatia is not supported through this version of the website.

ekupi.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: eKupi.hr offers a wide range of delivery methods including standard home delivery (to entrance), bulky item delivery, a special 'delivery to apartment' service in the Zagreb area, in-store pickup, parcel shop pickup, and parcel locker pickup.
PROVIDERS: Delivery partners include Hrvatska pošta, GLS, Box Now, and their own internal service (eKupi dostava / MSAN Logistika).
PRICING: Prices vary by package size and delivery method. Standard delivery starts at €1.99 (Box Now locker) or €2.99 (Hrvatska Pošta home delivery). Bulky item delivery to the entrance costs from €17.00. In-store pickup and pickup at eKupi's own parcel lockers are free. GLS offers free shipping for orders over €500.
RESTRICTIONS: Special conditions, schedules, and potential weight limits apply for deliveries to Croatian islands via Hrvatska pošta and GLS. GLS does not deliver large packages.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The 'Dostava u stan' (delivery to apartment) service for the Zagreb area is a key feature, which also includes the option to have an old appliance removed. The company offers its own free pickup points and parcel lockers in addition to using third-party networks like GLS, Hrvatska Pošta, and Box Now.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented on a clear, dedicated page. It effectively uses tables and lists to detail pricing, providers, and package categories. The information is comprehensive, transparent, and easy for customers to understand, with helpful links for specific details like island delivery schedules.

eurotoner.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The primary delivery method is home delivery for all of Croatia. Customers can also redirect their packages to a parcel locker. There is no in-store pickup or parcel shop option. A separate process exists for bulky items.
PROVIDERS: Standard deliveries are handled by GLS, DPD, and Paket 24 (Hrvatska pošta). Bulky items are delivered by a different, unnamed transport company.
PRICING: There is a flat delivery fee of 5 Euros for all orders. No free shipping threshold is mentioned.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery is only within Croatia. The delivery timeframe is quite wide, from 1 to 21 business days. Bulky items (over 10kg or large dimensions) cannot be paid for with cash on delivery and must be prepaid.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Customers have the option to redirect a home delivery shipment to a parcel locker. Payment at the parcel locker is possible by card.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is not on a dedicated page but is embedded within the very long 'General Terms and Conditions' (Uvjeti kupnje) page, making it difficult to locate. The information lacks clarity on several points, such as the specific provider for bulky items, island delivery policies, and express options. There is no mention of a free shipping threshold, which is a common feature for e-commerce sites.

eurovrt.hr.SUMMARY: Eurovrt.hr nudi dostavu isključivo unutar Hrvatske putem GLS dostavne službe, te opciju osobnog preuzimanja u poslovnici u Zagrebu. Cijene dostave su strukturirane prema težini pošiljke, od 6,65 € za pakete do 2 kg, pa sve do 231,25 € za pošiljke teže od 200 kg. Standardno vrijeme isporuke je 1-2 radna dana, dok za otoke iznosi 3-5 radnih dana. Ne postoji prag za besplatnu dostavu. NOTABLE FEATURES: Postoje posebna pravila za dostavu artikala dužih od 2 metra, no cijena nije specificirana. Kupac je odgovoran za istovar paleta težih od 30 kg. Moguće je osobno preuzimanje subotom. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Informacije o dostavi su jasno predstavljene na zasebnoj stranici, s detaljnom tablicom cijena. Nedostaju informacije o pragu za besplatnu dostavu, trošku pouzeća i specifičnim cijenama dostave za vangabaritne predmete ili nadoplatama za otoke.

exterim.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The primary delivery method is home delivery across Croatia. For a specific list of islands, delivery is restricted to pickup from the local post office. In-store pickup and parcel locker services are not mentioned.
PROVIDERS: The specific courier companies are not named, only referred to as 'logistics companies'. Croatian Post is implied for island deliveries.
PRICING: Delivery costs are calculated dynamically at checkout based on the shipment's weight, dimensions, and destination zone. A minimum fee applies. Free shipping is offered on select items within Croatia.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery to certain islands requires pickup from the post office. Home delivery is to the building entrance only, not to the apartment door.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The standard delivery timeframe is up to 15 working days, though many orders arrive within 2 days. Deliveries are made on weekdays only.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is located within the 'Uvjeti kupnje' (Terms of Purchase) page. While it covers the essential aspects, it lacks specific details like courier names and a transparent price list, which are only revealed during the checkout process. The information regarding island delivery restrictions is clear and specific. The overall quality of information is average.

extremeintimo.com.SUMMARY:
Extreme Intimo offers a single delivery method for Croatia: home delivery via the GLS courier service. The standard delivery cost is 4,50 €, but becomes free for any order with a total value of 50,00 € or more. The expected delivery timeframe is between 2 and 5 working days. Customers can opt for cash on delivery (COD), which comes with an additional surcharge of 1,00 €. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The primary features are a straightforward pricing model with a clear free shipping threshold and the availability of cash on delivery. Key limitations include the absence of alternative delivery options such as parcel shops, parcel lockers, or in-store pickup for online orders. Furthermore, there is no information regarding express or weekend delivery services, nor are there any specific details about shipping policies or potential surcharges for deliveries to Croatian islands.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly and concisely on a dedicated 'Dostava' page. However, its completeness is lacking. The absence of information on island deliveries is a significant omission for the Croatian market. The site would benefit from explicitly stating that express and weekend deliveries are unavailable and providing details on island shipping to manage customer expectations better.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free shipping for bikes on orders over €1500

extremevital.com.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery is available for both standard and bulky items. Standard packages are sent via GLS, while bulky items like bikes are handled by Gebrüder Weiss. In-store pickup is an option, but all stores are located in Slovenia.
PRICING: Standard delivery to Croatia is €4.90, with free shipping on orders over €75. Bulky item shipping is €29.90 for bikes (free over €1500) and €14.90 for other large goods. Cash on delivery has a €1.50 surcharge and is only for standard parcels.
RESTRICTIONS: Express, weekend, and island delivery options are not mentioned or available.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The store offers clear, separate shipping policies for standard and bulky goods, including different couriers and free shipping thresholds for each. COD is available for standard items.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is well-organized and easy to find on a dedicated page. It clearly outlines costs, providers, and delivery times for Croatia. However, it lacks details on potential island surcharges, weekend delivery, or express services.

The provided webpage contains shipping information for Slovakia, not Croatia. It lists delivery options such as SPS courier, Packeta courier, and Packeta pickup points/Z-BOXes. Pricing is in Euros and includes a free shipping threshold of €69 for SPS services and a standard €1.99 cash on delivery fee. No information regarding shipping providers, pricing, delivery times, or specific surcharges for Croatia could be found. All requested fields for Croatia are marked as 'not available'.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The Slovakian version of the site clearly outlines its domestic shipping costs and COD fees.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The information on the provided page is entirely irrelevant for determining shipping costs and options to Croatia. A dedicated page for Croatia is needed to extract the requested information.

If the volumetric weight is greater than the actual weight, the volumetric weight is charged. Volumetric weight is calculated using the formula 1 m3 = 200 kg. The delivery cost to the Dubrovnik-Neretva County and the islands is 50% higher than the price shown below the product.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: The delivery time is stated for each product in the online store. These deadlines are informative. The buyer will be notified of the expected delivery date after order confirmation via email.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: The delivery cost to the islands is 50% higher than the displayed price. Delivery is made to major islands. If the entered island is not on the list, delivery is possible to the nearest delivery service terminal.

geekbuying.com.SUMMARY:

Customers must proceed to checkout to get precise shipping information for their order, making it difficult to assess costs and options beforehand.

gizzmo.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The primary delivery method is home delivery. Pickup at an Overseas branch is offered as a fallback option if the initial delivery attempt is unsuccessful. No other pickup options like parcel lockers or in-store pickup are available.
PROVIDERS: Deliveries are handled by Overseas Express. For 'REBORN' products, the courier is Packeta (which is part of the Overseas Express group).
PRICING: Shipping is free for orders over 50 EUR. For orders below this value, the cost is 3.50 EUR for prepayment/card, 3.90 EUR for cash on delivery (COD), and 4.90 EUR for PayPal.
DELIVERY TIME: The standard delivery timeframe is 2-4 business days for orders placed before 14:00.
NOTABLE FEATURES: 'REBORN' products have a separate shipping rule where the shipping fee is always applied, regardless of the order value, unless other non-REBORN items in the cart exceed 50 EUR. COD is not available for orders containing REBORN products if the total value exceeds 700 EUR. There is no mention of express or weekend delivery services.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is located within the FAQ section rather than a dedicated page. The information provided is clear regarding standard delivery costs and times but lacks crucial details about potential surcharges for island deliveries, which is a notable omission for a Croatian e-commerce site. homedeco.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery and personal pickup at the warehouse are available. Delivery to parcel shops or lockers is not offered.
PROVIDERS: Standard home delivery is handled by Hrvatska pošta, DPD, and GLS. Bulky item (pallet) delivery is handled by Hrvatska pošta.
PRICING: Delivery costs are calculated based on package weight, with prices listed excluding VAT. Standard delivery starts from €3.58. Pallet delivery starts from €30.53. No free shipping threshold is mentioned. Personal pickup pricing is not specified.
RESTRICTIONS & FEATURES: Delivery to Croatian islands follows a special schedule by Hrvatska pošta. An unspecified surcharge may apply for Cash on Delivery. For large or expensive orders, a partial advance payment may be required before shipping.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The website provides detailed weight-based pricing for its carriers but lacks information on a free shipping threshold, the exact COD surcharge, and specific delivery times for bulky items. The fact that prices are listed without VAT could be made more prominent. Information is generally clear but could be more complete.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cijena dostave biti će napisana u ponudi. Cijena ovisi o količini, lokaciji i težini robe.

hora.hr.SUMMARY: SUMMARY: Home delivery is the only shipping option mentioned. The shipping cost is not fixed; it is calculated per order based on quantity, weight, and location, and then provided in a separate offer. The website does not specify courier providers, delivery times, or any surcharges for COD or island delivery. NOTABLE FEATURES: The primary feature is a quote-based shipping cost, which is also a major limitation as it prevents immediate checkout with a final price. No special services like express, weekend delivery, or alternative pickup options are mentioned. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is extremely basic and incomplete. Essential details like cost, delivery times, and providers are missing, requiring customers to contact the company for a quote before finalizing a purchase. This significantly hinders the user experience for an online store.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: not available

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Svu naručenu robu moguće je preuzeti u odabranom Diskont-u Stanić za vrijeme radnog vremena. Popis poslovnica u kojima možete koristiti uslugu PREUZMI možete provjeriti OVDJE.

weekend_delivery.days: Narudžbe zaprimljene petkom, u dane vikenda kao i u vrijeme blagdana odnosno drugih neradnih dana biti će spremne sljedećeg radnog dana sukladno navedenom rasporedu.

horeca.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The website's terms and conditions primarily detail an in-store pickup service ('Preuzmi u poslovnici') at their 'Diskont' stores. A vague mention of home delivery with a timeframe of '48 hours to a week' is present in the website footer, but no further details are provided. No other delivery methods like parcel shops or lockers are mentioned.
PROVIDERS: No shipping providers are mentioned for any delivery method.
PRICING & FEES: There is no information available regarding shipping costs, free shipping thresholds, or any surcharges for COD or island delivery.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The main offered service is in-store pickup, where orders placed before 14:00 on a workday are ready for collection within 24-48 hours. Payment is made upon collection in the store via cash or card.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information on the website is extremely poor and incomplete. The 'Terms of Business' page, which is the only source of information, almost exclusively describes the in-store pickup process and lacks critical details for home delivery, such as costs, providers, and specific conditions. A dedicated and clear shipping information page is missing.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 4,95 EUR

housebrand.com.SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Housebrand.com in Croatia offers three delivery methods: Home Delivery, Parcel Locker (GLS Paketomat), and In-Store Pickup (Click & Collect). PROVIDERS: The exclusive courier for home and parcel locker delivery is GLS. PRICING & DELIVERY TIME: Home delivery costs €4.95, and parcel locker delivery is €3.95, with a standard delivery time of 2-5 working days for both. In-store pickup is free. Free shipping is available for all orders of €40 or more. NOTABLE FEATURES: Cash on delivery (pouzeće) is offered as a payment method with no additional surcharge. There is no mention of express delivery, weekend delivery, or any specific surcharges or restrictions for delivering to Croatian islands. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a clear and easily accessible 'Dostava' page. It provides essential details on costs, delivery times, and available methods. However, it lacks information on express/weekend options and specific policies for island deliveries.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Besplatna dostava za sve narudžbe iznad 60 €

hummel.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery is the only mentioned option. 
PROVIDERS: No delivery providers are specified. 
PRICING: Free delivery is available for orders over 60 €. The standard delivery cost is not mentioned. Cash on delivery is available, but any potential surcharge is not specified. 
RESTRICTIONS: There is no information regarding island surcharges, weekend delivery, or express delivery. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website offers a 30-day return policy. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The provided FAQ page is insufficient for a complete shipping analysis. It lists relevant questions about delivery, but the answers are not visible in the provided content, leading to a lack of crucial information such as delivery providers, standard pricing, and delivery times.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 4,00 € for orders below 50,00 €
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: unutar 5 (pet) radnih dana od datuma narudžbe

iglusport.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The only delivery method offered is home delivery within Croatia. In-store pickup, parcel shops, and parcel lockers are not available for online orders.
PROVIDERS: Deliveries are handled by DPD. If the recipient is not available, the parcel can be picked up at a Hrvatska Pošta (Croatian Post) office.
PRICING: Standard delivery costs €4.00. Shipping is free for all orders with a value exceeding €50.00. Cash on delivery is an available payment method, but no specific surcharge is mentioned.
DELIVERY TIME & RESTRICTIONS: The standard delivery time is within 5 working days. There is no information available regarding express delivery, weekend delivery, or any specific surcharges or restrictions for delivering to Croatian islands.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is not on a dedicated page but is located within the 'Opća pravila i uvjeti' (General Terms and Conditions) document. The provided information is basic but clear. Key details such as island delivery policies, express options, and weekend services are missing, which makes the information incomplete for customers with specific needs.

HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 2 do 3 radna dana na područje grada Zagreba, do 7 radnih dana za područje kontinentalnog dijela Republike Hrvatske, odnosno do 7 radnih dana za područje otoka.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava do 7 radnih dana za područje otoka. Nema spomena o dodatnoj naknadi.

igrackedenis.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop provides home delivery, parcel locker, parcel shop, and in-store pickup options across Croatia.
PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by GLS and BOXNOW.
PRICING: Home delivery (GLS) is 5,98€. Parcel Shop/Locker (GLS) is 3,98€. Parcel Locker (BOXNOW) is 2,98€. Free shipping is offered on orders over 60€.
DELIVERY TIME & RESTRICTIONS: Delivery takes 2-3 working days for Zagreb and up to 7 working days for the rest of Croatia, including islands. Deliveries are not made on weekends or public holidays.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Multiple delivery options are available, including budget-friendly parcel lockers. Free personal pickup is available at their Zagreb location.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a dedicated 'Dostava' page and is generally clear. It outlines providers, pricing, and delivery times. However, it lacks information on COD surcharges, express delivery options, and any specific policies for bulky items.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: not available

igrackeshop.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The only available delivery method is home delivery.
PROVIDERS: DPD is the sole delivery provider mentioned.
PRICING: Information regarding shipping costs is not available on the FAQ page. Cash on delivery is an available payment method, but any associated surcharge is not specified.
DELIVERY TIME & RESTRICTIONS: Standard delivery takes 2-5 business days. There are no weekend deliveries. No information is provided about potential surcharges for island deliveries.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website offers cash on delivery. Orders are processed immediately, and cannot be held for later delivery.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information provided on the FAQ page is very basic and incomplete. Key details, most importantly the cost of shipping, are missing. There is no dedicated, comprehensive shipping information page.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: not available

ikea.com.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: IKEA Croatia offers home delivery for both smaller furniture ('Dostava do pločnik') and large/bulky orders, as well as a pickup option at 'IKEA dostavnom centru' (IKEA delivery center). 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The provided homepage mentions these services but does not contain specific details. There is a notice about potential delays for large orders. No information is available regarding express delivery, weekend delivery, island surcharges, or cash-on-delivery options. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The homepage confirms the availability of several key delivery and pickup services. However, it lacks any detailed information on pricing, delivery partners, specific timeframes, or surcharges. This information is likely located on a dedicated shipping page which was not provided.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The delivery price depends not only on the distance but also on other factors, such as the weight, volume, and price of the product. The exact cost is calculated in the shopping cart after entering the postal code for the delivery location.
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: ikoma.hr strives to cover the delivery cost for as many items as possible and provide the customer with free delivery, but for certain types of products and distances, this is not possible.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Products are sent for delivery the next working day after receipt of the order or payment, or within another time frame indicated with the product. The prescribed delivery time is indicated with each product on ikoma.hr.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The delivery cost depends on the product selection, its dimensions, the quantity chosen by the customer, and the distance to the delivery location. The cost is calculated in the shopping cart after entering the postal code.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: The prescribed delivery time is indicated with each product on ikoma.hr.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.cod_surcharge: Cash on delivery is not available for in-store pickup.

ikoma.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Ikoma.hr provides home delivery for both standard and bulky/heavy items throughout Croatia and offers free in-store pickup. PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by Gebrüder Weiss, Intereuropa, GLS, and the company's own vehicles. PRICING: Home delivery costs are calculated dynamically in the shopping cart based on product weight, volume, price, and the delivery postal code. The store aims to offer free shipping on many items. In-store pickup at their Bjelovar location is free. RESTRICTIONS: Home delivery is to the building entrance. Cash on delivery is available for home delivery but not for in-store pickup. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: A key feature is the dynamic shipping cost calculator in the shopping cart, which provides a price before the customer needs to enter personal data. The service is well-equipped to handle large and heavy construction materials. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is located within the 'Opći uvjeti poslovanja' (General Terms and Conditions) page. While comprehensive, the details are embedded in a lengthy legal document, making them difficult to find quickly. The primary method for determining shipping costs is to use the shopping cart calculator, which is practical but less direct than a simple price list or map.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Dostava je besplatna za pojedine artikle. Za područje Republike Hrvatske ako je narudžba minimalnog iznosa 200€ (s PDV-om). Ako je vrijednost narudžbe manja od gore navedenih 200€ vrijednosti obračunavamo trošak dostave u iznosu koji ovisi o težini paketa.

ioffice.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery is the only specified option available throughout Croatia. Delivery is handled by the company's own service or an unspecified courier. 
PRICING: Delivery is free for orders of 200€ or more. For orders below this amount, a shipping fee is charged based on the package weight, but the specific costs are not listed. 
DELIVERY TIME: The standard delivery timeframe is 24-72 hours. 
RESTRICTIONS: There is no information on special delivery services like express or weekend delivery, nor are there details about surcharges for island deliveries or cash on delivery. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The free shipping threshold is set at a relatively high 200€. The lack of specific courier names means customers do not know who will handle their delivery. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information provided is very basic. Key details such as specific shipping costs for smaller orders, courier partners, and alternative delivery options (parcel shops, lockers, in-store pickup) are missing. The information is not comprehensive enough for a customer to make a fully informed decision without further inquiry.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 3,95 € per package. Free for orders over 80 €.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 3 working days for orders placed by 13:00. 7-14 days for items from the central warehouse.

express_delivery.delivery_time: Same day for orders received by 14:00, delivery until 21:00. Only for products in stock in Zagreb or Rijeka.

weekend_delivery.days: Delivery is only on working days from Monday to Friday.

HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to islands may be extended by an additional 1-2 working days. Delays are currently possible for the islands of Vis, Brač, Hvar, and Krk.

istyle.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The primary delivery methods are standard home delivery across Croatia and same-day express delivery in Zagreb and Rijeka. In-store pickup is also available at their physical locations. 
PROVIDERS: Standard delivery is handled by DPD, while same-day delivery is managed by Locodels. 
PRICING: Standard delivery costs 3,95 €, with free shipping on orders over 80 €. Same-day delivery is a flat rate of 9 €. Pricing for in-store pickup is not specified. 
RESTRICTIONS: Deliveries are only made on weekdays (Monday-Friday). Delivery to islands may take 1-2 extra days, and there are current noted delays for Istria and the islands of Vis, Brač, Hvar, and Krk. Same-day delivery is contingent on the product being in stock at the local store and the order being placed by 14:00. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The availability of same-day delivery in Zagreb and Rijeka is a key service. The free shipping threshold is clearly defined at 80 €. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a dedicated 'Dostava i preuzimanje' page and is generally clear and well-organized. It clearly outlines costs, timelines, and providers for standard and express services. However, it lacks information on COD surcharges, bulky item shipping, and options for parcel shops or lockers.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Besplatna dostava do Vašeg kućnog praga. The minimum order value for free shipping is not specified.

ivancica.hr.SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The website prominently advertises free home delivery to the customer's doorstep. No other delivery methods like parcel shops, parcel lockers, or in-store pickup are mentioned. PROVIDERS & PRICING: The specific shipping provider is not named. Delivery is stated to be free, but the minimum order value required to qualify for free shipping is not specified. RESTRICTIONS & SPECIAL SERVICES: Information regarding delivery timeframes, express delivery, weekend delivery, island surcharges, or cash on delivery options is not available on the homepage. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information on the homepage is very basic. While free delivery is highlighted, crucial details are missing. Customers must navigate to other pages, such as 'Besplatna dostava' or 'Opći uvjeti poslovanja', to find complete information.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 4,00 € for orders under 40,00 €. Free for orders over 40,00 €.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to islands may take longer according to the GLS schedule. No extra cost is mentioned.

jadran-carapa.hr.SUMMARY:
Primary delivery method is Home Delivery via GLS. The shipping fee is €4.00 for orders under €40.00, with free shipping for orders exceeding this amount. The estimated delivery time is 2-5 business days. Delivery to islands is available but may take longer, with no specified surcharge. Cash on delivery is an option with no mentioned extra fee.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The webshop offers a clear free shipping threshold at €40.00. Island delivery is supported.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clear and concise but limited. It only details one delivery provider (GLS) and one method (Home Delivery). Information about other potential services like parcel shops, lockers, express, or weekend delivery is absent. In-store pickup is explicitly stated as not available.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: not available
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Predviđeni rok isporuke za webshop narudžbu iznosi u prosjeku 10 radnih dana za robu koja je dostupna i na koju se ne stavlja tisak ili dotisak. Za robu koja je dostupna i za koju je potrebno odraditi tisak ili dotisak, predviđeni rok isporuke produžuje se za još 10 radnih dana, a isti može biti i kraći ili duži, ali ne duži od 20 radnih dana. Pošiljke se dostavljaju na adresu kroz 1-3 radna dana od dana kad im je predana pošiljka.

jako.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Jako.hr offers home delivery in Croatia via Hrvatska pošta (Paket24). No other delivery methods like parcel shops, lockers, or in-store pickup are mentioned. 
PRICING & TIMEFRAME: Shipping costs are not specified. The average delivery time is 10 working days for standard items and up to 20 working days for items requiring printing, plus an additional 1-3 working days for the courier service. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The key characteristic is the long processing and delivery timeframe, particularly for customized products. There is no information on express delivery, weekend delivery, island surcharges, or COD fees. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is incomplete. While the delivery provider and timeframes are detailed, the complete absence of pricing information is a major drawback for customers. The information is available on a dedicated page but lacks essential details.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing:

Za narudžbe u vrijednosti do 50 EUR poštarina iznosi 3,95 EUR ako plaćate putem bankovnog transfera, platnom karticom ili putem usluge PayPal.

jessyss.hr.SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery and parcel shop pickup are available. PROVIDERS: Delivery is managed by Packeta, which collaborates with Overseas Express for mainland deliveries and Hrvatska Pošta for islands and remote areas. Parcel shop pickups are handled by the Overseas Express (OEX shop) network. PRICING: Standard home delivery is 3.95 EUR for orders up to 50 EUR, and free for orders above 50 EUR (excluding COD). A 1 EUR surcharge applies to all cash on delivery orders. Pricing for parcel shop delivery is not specified. DELIVERY TIME: The standard delivery timeframe is 3-5 business days. RESTRICTIONS: No express or weekend delivery options are mentioned. Delivery to islands is available via Hrvatska Pošta, but no specific surcharge is listed. NOTABLE FEATURES: The key features are a clear free shipping threshold at 50 EUR, a multi-carrier approach ensuring wide coverage (including islands), and the ability to redirect packages to a large network of over 850 parcel shops (OEX shops). A key limitation is the absence of an express delivery service. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented on a single, easy-to-find page. It clearly details providers, standard costs, delivery times, and COD fees. The information is comprehensive for standard delivery but could be improved by specifying if the standard pricing applies to parcel shop delivery and clarifying if any surcharges exist for island deliveries.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Besplatna dostava za narudžbe iznad 65€.

jysk.hr.SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: JYSK.hr offers home delivery for small and bulky items, as well as two types of in-store pickup: 'Click & Collect' and 'Delivery to Store'. Parcel shop and locker delivery are not available. DELIVERY PROVIDERS: The specific delivery companies are not named on the website. PRICING: Home delivery starts at €2.99 and varies based on item size and delivery distance. 'Click & Collect' is free. 'Delivery to Store' is free for orders of €59 or more. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of €2.65 applies to home deliveries. DELIVERY TIMES: Small items are delivered in 4-6 working days, while bulky items take 5-14 working days. 'Click & Collect' orders are ready for pickup within 30 minutes. 'Delivery to Store' takes 5-10 working days. RESTRICTIONS: Delivery is available only within Croatia. There is a specific list of islands to which delivery is not possible. Special delivery conditions apply to the old town of Rovinj. NOTABLE FEATURES: The 'Click & Collect' service is exceptionally fast. The company clearly distinguishes delivery terms for small vs. bulky items and provides a detailed list of islands excluded from delivery. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive and clearly laid out on the 'Uvjeti prodaje i dostave' page. The main omission is the lack of names for their delivery partners. Pricing structure is explained, but final costs are only calculated in the cart. Island delivery rules are very specific and helpful.

PRICING: Shipping costs are not fixed and are calculated dynamically in the shopping cart based on the products and delivery address. No free shipping threshold is mentioned. In-store pickup is free but requires prepayment.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery to Croatian islands takes longer and is subject to provider schedules. Bulky items like fishing rods, tents, and chairs cannot be delivered to parcel lockers. Weekend delivery is not available, except for in-store pickup on Saturdays.
NOTABLE FEATURES: A good variety of delivery carriers and methods are available. Parcel locker delivery is a key feature, with two different providers. Cash on delivery is explicitly mentioned as an option for Box Now lockers, handled via a payment link.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive and clearly presented on a dedicated page. It details the providers, delivery times, and specific conditions for each service. The main drawback is the lack of upfront pricing information, requiring customers to proceed to checkout to see shipping costs.

klimakoncept.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery across Croatia and in-store pickup in Split are available. Parcel shop and locker delivery are not offered.
PROVIDERS: Delivery is handled by Overseas Express, LagerMax, and DPD.
PRICING: Home delivery is free for all orders over 200 €. In-store pickup is free. Pricing for orders under the free shipping threshold is not specified.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery is available to most of Croatia, but excludes some islands where couriers do not operate. Delivery to islands takes longer, up to 10 working days. Weekend delivery is not available.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The free delivery applies to the entire product range, which primarily consists of bulky items like air conditioners. There is a clear policy for handling damaged goods upon receipt. In-store pickup requires prior arrangement as items are not immediately available.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is well-detailed on a dedicated page, covering costs, delivery times, providers, and island delivery specifics. However, it lacks information on cash-on-delivery (COD), express options, and the cost for orders below the free shipping threshold.

konzum.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Konzum provides two main home delivery services: a standard next-day delivery using its own vehicle fleet and an express 3-hour delivery in partnership with Wolt. The standard service covers major cities like Zagreb, Split, Rijeka, Zadar, and Osijek with their surrounding areas. The Wolt express service is restricted to the inner city area of Zagreb. In-store pickup options ('Pokupi' and 'Drive In') are indicated but not detailed on the page. 
PRICING: Delivery pricing is tiered based on the order total. It costs €4.99 for orders up to €90, €3.99 for orders between €90 and €130, and €2.99 for orders between €130 and €160. Delivery is free for all orders exceeding €160. The minimum order value for delivery is €50. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: A key feature is the 3-hour express delivery via Wolt in Zagreb. Standard delivery is available on Saturdays. Payment for Wolt deliveries is strictly online, while standard Konzum delivery allows for payment upon receipt. Bulky items are excluded from the Wolt express service. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is presented clearly, effectively distinguishing between the two delivery types. The pricing structure is transparent and easy to find. However, the page lacks any information regarding delivery to Croatian islands and does not provide details on the 'Pokupi' (In-Store Pickup) or 'Drive In' services mentioned in the site's footer.

kralj.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Kralj.hr provides home delivery throughout Croatia and in-store pickup. Home delivery is handled by Intereuropa and GLS. In-store pickup is available at their locations in Zagreb and Zadar.
PRICING: Standard delivery for items up to 30 kg starts at €7.50. For the wider Zagreb area, delivery is €25 for the first appliance and €15 for each additional one. The cost for heavier items is calculated based on Intereuropa's price list. In-store pickup is free.
DELIVERY TIME & FEATURES: Delivery is typically within 1-2 days of payment. Weekend delivery (Saturday) is available for Zagreb and some surrounding towns. There are specific delivery days for different towns near Zagreb. Bulky items are delivered only to the building entrance, not carried inside, especially if stairs are involved.
LIMITATIONS: There is no information on express delivery, COD options, or specific surcharges for island deliveries. Pricing for heavy/bulky items is not fixed and requires an inquiry. The website does not offer delivery to parcel shops or lockers.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is available but combines general national delivery with specific local rules, which can be confusing. Key details like island delivery costs and COD options are missing. The quality of information is moderate; it covers the basics but lacks transparency on certain costs and services.

libido.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers several delivery methods for Croatia: home delivery via GLS, pickup at GLS PaketShop locations, delivery to BoxNow parcel lockers, and free personal pickup at their warehouse in Zagreb.
PROVIDERS: GLS and BoxNow.
PRICING: Delivery is free for all orders over €40. For orders under €40, GLS delivery (home or parcel shop) costs €3.19, and BoxNow parcel locker delivery costs €1.99. Personal pickup is always free.
DELIVERY TIME: The standard delivery time is 1-2 business days. For remote islands, it can extend to 3-5 business days.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The webshop emphasizes extremely discreet packaging. GLS provides SMS and email notifications with a 3-hour delivery window and allows customers to redirect packages to a parcel shop. BoxNow lockers are accessible 24/7 for package pickup. Cash on delivery is not available for personal pickup.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive, clearly structured, and easy to understand. All delivery methods are explained in detail with pricing and timelines presented in a clear table. The only information not explicitly stated is the exact surcharge for cash on delivery, if any.

No information is provided regarding express delivery, island surcharges, or shipping for bulky items. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated 'Dostava' page. moemax.hr.SUMMARY:
Mömax.hr provides home delivery throughout Croatia, with distinct services for standard parcels and bulky (cargo) items. Standard parcel delivery costs €3.90 via DPD, while bulky item delivery is €26.50 via Gebrüder Weiss. All deliveries are free for orders exceeding €530.00. The standard delivery timeframe is 3-10 working days, Monday to Friday. A surcharge of €9.20 applies to all island deliveries. Customers can also opt for free in-store pickup or redirect DPD parcels to one of 840 partner pickup locations (parcel shops). 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The company uses DPD for parcels and Gebrüder Weiss for bulky goods. Bulky items are delivered to the curbside, but in-home delivery can be arranged for an additional fee by contacting customer service. There is no weekend or express delivery option. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is well-organized and detailed on a dedicated page. It clearly differentiates between parcel and cargo shipping, providing costs, providers, and delivery times for each. The inclusion of information on island surcharges, in-store pickup, and parcel shop redirection is helpful. However, details on COD surcharges and a list of store locations for pickup are not available on the page.

SUMMARY: Dostava se vrši isključivo unutar Hrvatske. Standardnu dostavu obavlja GLS po cijeni od 4,95 € za narudžbe do 47 €, dok je za narudžbe iznad tog iznosa dostava besplatna. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Informacije o dostavi su sveobuhvatne, ali su smještene unutar opsežnog dokumenta 'Opći uvjeti poslovanja', što otežava njihovo pronalaženje. pevex.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Pevex offers home delivery throughout Croatia and a free 'Click & Collect' in-store pickup service available at 31 locations. Parcel shop and parcel locker delivery are not available.
PRICING & PROVIDERS: Home delivery costs are calculated at checkout based on order weight and delivery location; specific price tiers or free shipping thresholds are not listed. The courier companies used are not specified. In-store pickup is free.
DELIVERY TIMEFRAME: The standard delivery time is 2-10 working days, Monday to Friday. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: Saturday delivery is possible but not guaranteed for major cities. There is no mention of express delivery or cash-on-delivery surcharges.
RESTRICTIONS: Home delivery is not available to a significant number of island postal codes. For some other islands, delivery is limited to the ferry port. Deliveries to the historic centers of cities like Dubrovnik and Rovinj are also restricted.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is available on a dedicated page but lacks some key details. While island delivery restrictions are clearly listed, the absence of a price list before checkout and no mention of specific courier partners makes it difficult for customers to compare options. Information for bulky items is not separately detailed but is covered under the general weight-based pricing.

PROVIDERS: Deliveries are handled by DPD Croatia and the company's own delivery service.
PRICING: Delivery for mainland Croatia costs 5,99 EUR for orders up to 59,99 EUR and is free for orders of 60,00 EUR or more. The delivery time is 5-7 working days.
RESTRICTIONS: A mandatory surcharge of 7,50 EUR applies to all deliveries to Croatian islands not connected by a bridge, regardless of the order value. If an island order is also below 60,00 EUR, the standard 5,99 EUR delivery fee is charged in addition to the island surcharge.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Cash on delivery (COD) is available for a surcharge of 0,66 EUR. There is no mention of express or weekend delivery services.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is clearly detailed within the 'Opći uvjeti poslovanja' (General Terms and Conditions) page. Costs, delivery times, and island surcharges are explicitly stated. However, the information is not on a dedicated, easily accessible 'Dostava' (Delivery) page, which could reduce visibility for customers. The lack of alternative delivery methods like in-store pickup or parcel points is a significant limitation.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 7,00 € for orders under 80,00 €. Free for orders over 80,00 €.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: 2,00 € for orders under 80,00 €. Free for orders over 80,00 €.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.locations: Available in their stores, list at www.ferivisport.hr/lokacije
IN_STORE_PICKUP.cod_surcharge: not available, only for prepaid orders (card or PayPal)

runninggate.hr.SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery, parcel locker delivery, and in-store pickup within Croatia. PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by GLS, while parcel locker delivery uses BoxNow. PRICING: Delivery is free for all orders over €80.00. For smaller orders, GLS home delivery costs €7.00 and BoxNow locker delivery costs €2.00. In-store pickup pricing is not specified. DELIVERY TIME: The standard delivery timeframe is up to 7 working days. NOTABLE FEATURES: In-store pickup is only available for orders prepaid by card or PayPal. No cash on delivery option is mentioned for any delivery method. There is no information on express delivery, weekend delivery, or potential surcharges for island delivery. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a dedicated 'Dostava' page and is generally clear and easy to understand. It covers the basic delivery methods, providers, and costs effectively. However, it lacks details on several key aspects such as island delivery policies, COD options, and express services, which would improve completeness.

sabolic-interijeri.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The website offers home delivery for standard packages (up to 50kg) and bulky items (over 50kg). No other delivery methods like parcel shops, lockers, or in-store pickup are mentioned. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: Delivery to islands and the Dalmatia region requires a custom price quote, which is provided after the order is placed. Cash on Delivery (COD) is available but limited to orders up to 150 EUR; no surcharge is specified. Pricing for standard items is in HRK, while bulky items are priced in EUR based on weight and regional zones. No specific delivery providers or timeframes are listed. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is located on the 'Uvjeti prodaje' (Terms of Sale) page. It provides detailed pricing tables but lacks clarity on delivery times and providers. There's a contradiction in the currency used for standard packages (HRK in the table vs. a note mentioning EUR). The process for island delivery is not clearly defined upfront, requiring customers to wait for a quote.

sancta-domenica.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers several delivery methods: Standard Home Delivery for small packages, Bulky Product Home Delivery, GLS Home Delivery, delivery to Hrvatska Pošta Parcel Lockers, and free In-Store Pickup. A same-day express delivery via Locodels is listed but currently unavailable.
PROVIDERS: Delivery partners include Hrvatska pošta (Paket24), GLS, and Intereuropa for bulky items.
PRICING: In-store pickup is free. Parcel locker delivery is 3 EUR. Standard home delivery is 5 EUR (Hrvatska pošta) or 7 EUR (GLS). Bulky item delivery costs between 19 EUR and 29 EUR. A premium service for delivery into the apartment, with an option for installation, is available in Zagreb and Split areas for 35-120 EUR.
RESTRICTIONS: Deliveries are made to the entrance of the building. There are specific delivery schedules and potential weight restrictions for islands. Cash on delivery is not mentioned.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The store offers a wide range of delivery options, including specialized services for bulky goods like installation and removal of old appliances. The option to choose between different couriers (Hrvatska pošta, GLS) for standard parcels is a plus.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive, well-structured, and easy to find. It clearly outlines the different services, providers, and costs. The only ambiguity is the exact delivery timeframe, which is calculated at checkout.

HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na otoke se vrši, ali za teže pošiljke spadaju u posebnu cjenovnu zonu. Za standardne pakete, dostava se vrši prema popisu naselja Hrvatske pošte; za ostala mjesta potrebno je preuzimanje u poštanskom uredu.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: CJENIK DOSTAVE za Hrvatsku od 50 do 400 kg. Cijene ovise o 4 definirane zone dostave (ZONA 1 - Zagreb i okolica, ZONA 2 - veći gradovi osim otoka, ZONA 3 - Gospić, ZONA 4 - Dubrovnik i otoci). Točne cijene po zonama nisu navedene.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: Uobičajeni rok isporuke je do 5 radnih dana po potvrdi narudžbe.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Otoci spadaju u ZONU 4, koja je zasebna cjenovna kategorija. Cijene za zone nisu navedene.

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Nije navedeno kao zasebna opcija s cijenom. Preuzimanje u poštanskom uredu je obavezno za mjesta gdje Hrvatska pošta ne vrši dostavu na kućnu adresu.

saturo.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Dostava na kućnu adresu dostupna je u cijeloj Hrvatskoj, s mogućnošću preuzimanja u poštanskim uredima za lokacije bez kućne dostave. Ne nude se opcije dostave na paketomate ili osobno preuzimanje u trgovini.
PROVIDERS: Glavni dostavni partneri su Hrvatska pošta (za pakete do 50 kg) i GLS. Za šire područje Zagreba (Samobor, Zaprešić, Velika Gorica, Sesvete, Sveta Nedelja) koriste vlastitu dostavnu službu.
PRICING: Cijene su jasno definirane samo za lokalnu dostavu vlastitim vozilom (3.99€ - 10.99€ ovisno o težini). Za teže pošiljke (50-400 kg) cijene se temelje na 4 zone, ali točan cjenik nije prikazan. Cijene za standardnu dostavu (do 50 kg) za ostatak Hrvatske nisu navedene. Prag za besplatnu dostavu nije spomenut.
RESTRICTIONS: Dostava na otoke je moguća, ali se za teže pošiljke nalaze u posebnoj, skupljoj zoni dostave. Za neka mjesta, dostava se ne vrši na kućnu adresu već je paket potrebno preuzeti u lokalnom poštanskom uredu.
NOTABLE FEATURES: Nude vlastitu dostavu za područje Zagreba i okolice s unosom u stan bez obzira na kat. Moguće je plaćanje karticama prilikom preuzimanja za njihovu lokalnu dostavu.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Informacije o dostavi su djelomično dostupne, ali ključni detalji nedostaju. Cjenik je nepotpun, posebno za nacionalnu dostavu standardnih i teških paketa. Nedostaju informacije o plaćanju pouzećem, ekspresnoj i vikend dostavi. Stranica se poziva na cjenik iz 2018. godine, što ukazuje na moguću zastarjelost informacija.

DELIVERY OPTIONS: Tapiker.hr offers home delivery as the sole shipping method for online orders. There is no mention of parcel shop, parcel locker, or in-store pickup options.

PRICING: Standard delivery for packages up to 5 kg costs 6,50 EUR for orders under 50 EUR and is free for orders over 50 EUR. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 1,00 EUR applies to all relevant orders. Bulky items have a tiered pricing system based on weight: packages from 5-20 kg cost 10,90 EUR, and packages from 20-25 kg cost 13,40 EUR. For packages heavier than 25 kg or pallet deliveries, customers must request a custom quote.
DELIVERY TIMES & RESTRICTIONS: Delivery within continental Croatia takes 1-3 business days, while delivery to islands can take up to 5 business days. There is no mention of an additional price surcharge for island deliveries. Certain fragile items, like fireclay plates, are not shipped, while others are sent at the customer's own risk.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website provides clear, weight-based pricing for heavier items and offers pallet delivery upon request via email. No express or weekend delivery services are available.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a dedicated 'Uvjeti dostave' page and is quite detailed, especially regarding pricing for different weight categories. However, the presentation could be improved with a table for easier comparison. The information is sufficient for standard and bulky deliveries but lacks options like express shipping or alternative pickup points.

woolf.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers standard home delivery, home delivery for bulky items (fitness equipment), and in-store pickup. Delivery to parcel shops or lockers is not available.
PROVIDERS: Standard delivery is handled by GLS and HP Expres. Bulky items are delivered via unspecified 'cargo transport'.
PRICING: Standard home delivery costs 4.5€ and is free for orders over 60€. Delivery for bulky items is stated to be free. In-store pickup pricing is not specified.
RESTRICTIONS: Deliveries are made only on business days (Monday-Friday). Delivery to islands follows the courier's specific schedule, with no mention of an extra surcharge.
NOTABLE FEATURES: In-store pickup is available at their physical location in Mursko Središće. Special conditions apply to returns of bulky items; if a customer cancels an order after it has been shipped, they must cover the return costs.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is found within the 'Uvjeti kupnje' (Terms of Purchase) page. The details for standard delivery are clear. However, information for bulky items is less specific, lacking details on providers and delivery times. Key information such as COD surcharges and express delivery options is not provided.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 5 EUR for orders up to 69,99 EUR. Free for orders over 69,99 EUR.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na otoke ne kasni za klasičnom dostavom na kopnu ali moguće je da zbog loših prometnih (i inih) veza paket putuje nešto dulje.

weekend_delivery.days: od ponedjeljka do petka od 12,00 do 15,00 sati

wow-junkie.com.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery is available across Croatia, along with a free in-store pickup option in Zagreb. No parcel shop or locker delivery is offered.
PROVIDERS: GLS and HP Express are used for home delivery.
PRICING: Home delivery costs 5 EUR for orders under 69,99 EUR and is free for orders of 69,99 EUR or more. In-store pickup is free.
DELIVERY TIME: Standard delivery takes 1-3 business days.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The store offers free shipping on a relatively low threshold. There is no extra charge for delivery to islands, although it may take longer. Express and weekend delivery are not available. Information on a cash-on-delivery surcharge is missing.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on a dedicated 'Dostava' page and is clear and easy to understand. It covers the most important aspects like cost, providers, and delivery times. However, it lacks information on certain specifics like COD surcharges and does not offer alternative delivery methods like parcel points.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Besplatna dostava za narudžbe od € 530,00
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to islands is available with special summer and winter schedules, but extra costs are not specified.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to islands is available with special summer and winter schedules, but extra costs are not specified.

xxxlesnina.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery for standard and bulky items, as well as an in-store pickup service (Click & Collect). Delivery to parcel shops or parcel lockers is not available.
PROVIDERS: All deliveries are exclusively handled by Gebrüder Weiss and DPD.
PRICING: Delivery is free for all online orders with a value of €530 or more. The cost for orders below this threshold is not specified on the page. Pricing for the Click & Collect service is also not mentioned.
RESTRICTIONS: Delivery to Croatian islands is possible, but it operates on separate summer and winter schedules. Information regarding potential surcharges for island deliveries is not provided.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The website explicitly warns customers about potential phishing scams, clarifying that they only partner with Gebrüder Weiss and DPD for deliveries.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The delivery information page clearly states the shipping providers and the free shipping threshold. However, it lacks crucial details such as standard delivery costs, delivery timeframes, and specific costs or conditions for island deliveries. Much of the information appears to be contained within accordion-style sections that were not expanded, making a full assessment difficult.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: not available

yachts.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The website offers home delivery and in-store pickup. The site advertises 'fast delivery' but does not provide specific details on the homepage. In-store pickup is available at their retail location in Split. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: No specific details regarding shipping providers, pricing, delivery times, or surcharges for islands or cash on delivery are available on the homepage. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The homepage provides very limited shipping information. Customers must consult the 'Uvjeti prodaje' (Terms of Sale) page, linked in the footer, or proceed to checkout to find detailed shipping policies and costs.

HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: The customer chooses the form of delivery in the shopping cart, where he can also find information about the delivery price.

zajo.net.SUMMARY:
SUMMARY: Home delivery to Croatia is available, but specific details are lacking. Pricing, delivery times, and carrier options are only provided during the checkout process. There is no information on parcel shops, parcel lockers, in-store pickup, or special handling for bulky items. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: Orders within the EU are not subject to customs duties. A tracking number is sent via email after an order is placed. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The dedicated shipping page is very general and lacks crucial information for customers in Croatia. Key details like cost and delivery speed are not disclosed upfront, requiring a user to start the checkout process to find out, which is inconvenient.

zebra.hr.SUMMARY:
Zebra.hr offers free home delivery for all products across Croatia, including islands, with a delivery timeframe of 5-30 working days. Delivery is handled by a wide range of couriers, including DPD, GLS, Overseas, and HP. Cash on delivery is an option for most products but includes a fixed manipulative cost of €11.99. No express delivery, weekend delivery, parcel shop/locker, or in-store pickup options are available.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The standout feature is free shipping for all items to all locations in Croatia. A key limitation is that delivery for bulky items is curbside only (unloading from the truck), with the customer responsible for further transport. There are also delivery restrictions to certain islands for products from the manufacturer Vidaxl.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensively detailed within the 'Uvjeti korištenja' (Terms of Use) page. All necessary details regarding providers, pricing, delivery times, and surcharges are clearly stated. While the information is thorough, it is not located on a separate, easily accessible 'Delivery' page, requiring users to navigate the terms and conditions.

znanje.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: Znanje.hr offers home delivery within Croatia via DPD. The cost is €3.50 for orders under €25 and free for orders of €25 or more. Standard delivery time is 3-7 working days, which may extend to 10 days during promotions. There are no alternative delivery options such as parcel shops, parcel lockers, or in-store pickup for online orders mentioned on the delivery page. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: The delivery information is straightforward. There is no mention of express delivery, weekend delivery, cash on delivery (COD), or any specific surcharges for island deliveries. International shipping is available via DHL Express. 
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information for domestic orders is clear and easy to find but lacks detail on several common options and potential surcharges (like COD or island delivery). Information on alternative pickup methods is absent.

zuzi.hr.SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery across Croatia and personal in-store pickup. Parcel shop and locker delivery are not available.
PROVIDERS: Home delivery is handled by GLS and Hrvatska pošta (Croatian Post).
PRICING: Delivery is free for orders over €70. The cost for orders below this amount is not specified. There is no surcharge for Cash on Delivery (COD).
DELIVERY TIMES: Orders placed by 13:30 on a workday are typically delivered the next workday. For Croatian islands not directly served by GLS, delivery is handled by Hrvatska pošta and can take 48-168 hours.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The standard delivery is very fast (next day for mainland). The shop provides SMS notifications about the shipment. In-store pickup is available on Saturdays at their Zagreb location.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is detailed and clearly explains the delivery process, providers, and timelines, including specific procedures for island deliveries. The main omission is the lack of information on the standard shipping fee for orders under the free shipping threshold.
